Detailed Description

Definition at line 19 of file HodoscopeWriteEngine.hh.

Member Function Documentation

void marlin::HodoscopeWriteEngine::fillVariables ( EVENT::LCEvent *  evt  )  [virtual]

Implement this to extract the variables which you want to fill into the ROOT tree from the event. Write the value of the variables you want to add to the tree to the member variables, which you registered to the ROOT tree. The RootTreeWriter will call TTree::Fill() for you.

Parameters:
evt the current event

Implements marlin::RootWriteEngine.

References CALICE::HodoscopeBlock::GetAccept(), CALICE::HodoscopeBlock::GetADC(), CALICE::HodoscopeBlock::GetCycleN(), and CALICE::HodoscopeBlock::GetTDC().

virtual const std::string& marlin::HodoscopeWriteEngine::getEngineName (  )  [inline, virtual]

Returns the name of the engine to the RootTreeWriter processor.

Returns:
Must return a string with the engine name.
Todo:
fixme: should be const, but must be declared const in implementations too. Need to fix all existing engines?!?

Implements marlin::RootWriteEngine.

Definition at line 28 of file HodoscopeWriteEngine.hh.

void marlin::HodoscopeWriteEngine::registerBranches ( TTree *   )  [virtual]

Implement to register local variables to the output tree

Parameters:
pointer to the ROOT tree, which the RootTreeWriter processor fills at the end of each event. Usually the implementation looks like 

    /// hostTree->Branch("variable",&_variable" ,"variable/F"  );
    ///

. But you can add any type of branch you like.

Implements marlin::RootWriteEngine.

Definition at line 102 of file HodoscopeWriteEngine.cc.

void marlin::HodoscopeWriteEngine::registerParameters (  )  [virtual]

Used to register steering parameters. Implement to register marlin steering file parameters. Use marlin syntax to register parameters for the calling RootTreeWriter processor.

use 

    /// _hostProc.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(...)
    /// _hostProc.relayRegister...()
    ///

instead of marlin processors 

register...()

methods

Implements marlin::RootWriteEngine.
